user: kya tum muze unchai pe suraksha ke liye kya pehanana chahiye uski soochi de sakte ho?
bot: Apan ka kamgar jagah (workplace) mein falls se bachane ke liye, aapko prayukt fall protection equipment ka prayog karna chahiye. Yeh shamil puhla sarvang harness, lifeline, aur anchor point ho sakta hai.
